description: Try our easy to follow Cobb Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cobb salad,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Spring,Winter,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Picnic,Tomato,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Cobb Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 baby cos lettuce, trimmed, leaves separated
1 avocado, halved, deseeded, cut into thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a frying pan over medium heat and cook bacon for 4 minutes on each side or until golden and crisp. Transfer to a paper towellined plate to drain. Break each rasher into 4 pieces.
Cook chicken in same pan over medium heat for 8 minutes on each side or until browned and cooked through. Transfer to a chopping board. Stand for 5 minutes before thinly slicing.
Meanwhile, place vinegar, mustard and oil in a screwtop jar, shake well and season.
Arrange lettuce in a dish. Top with chicken, bacon, avocado, tomato and egg. Spoon over dressing and serve.
